newsletter.welcome: Hi, zu Teil 29 von Ivo's Ecotainment Newsletter!
newsletter.intro:
Garteln, Garteln, Garteln!
Ok let's go: Another best of the Econet!

parts.title: Blumen Graffiti
text: Maurice Maggi ist Schweizer Guerilla GÃ¤rtner Pionier, Flowerbomber der ersten Stunde.

parts.title: Refugee Camp Gardens
text: Kenneth Helphand & Henk Wildschut dokumentieren GÃ¤rten in den FlÃ¼chtlingscamps der Welt, von Calais bis Kashmir.

-> <small>Rooted is a photo book about the world of micro-gardens in refugee camps. These tiny patches of greenery appear wherever camp dwellers seek hope, solace and dignity in caring for plants and flowers</small>
